item.title: Try
item.description: Overview in Bazel Bazel is an open-source build and test tool similar to Make, Maven, and Gradle. It uses a human-readable, high-level build language. Bazel supports projects in multiple languages and builds outputs for multiple platforms. Bazel supports large codebases across multiple repositories, and large numbers of users. LOC Statistics and Measuring At first, we used command git ls-files | grep -E '.java' | xargs wc -l to calculate the LOC of the cloned local repository.
